price: Muvugishwamana! Ibuka n’ivyashikiye Bene Salima na Bene Haaritha, igihe batekerwa n’ubwoba bagashaka guhunga urugamba bari kumwe n’indyarya karuhariwe Abdullahi mwene Ubayyi, batinya guhangana n’umwansi, ariko Imana Allah Umuhagarikizi wabo Yarakinze baraheza bararinda baja ku rugamba bizeye Imana Allah. Kubera ivyo rero, abemeramana nyabuna nibishimikize gusa Imana Allah bayizere.
arabic: إِذۡ هَمَّت طَّآئِفَتَانِ مِنكُمۡ أَن تَفۡشَلَا وَٱللَّهُ وَلِيُّهُمَاۗ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ

meta.transliteration: idh hammat ṭāifatāni minkum an tafshalā wal-lahu waliyyuhumā waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minūna
